name: Custom Crown
description: Purchaser is making  a $10 deposit on the purchase of up to 3 crowns.  Purchaser selects style, color and size subject to availability.  Email the selections within 24 hours to ifthecrownfits@mail.com after receiving email confirmation of purchase.  Within 15 business days of receipt of the email, remaining balance (including shipping) will be invoiced to purchaser.  Crowns will ship within 3 business days of receipt of payment.

name: Victoria
description:
Around the globe, things have been named after Queen Victoria - including Africa's largest Lake, a waterfall, a Canadian Holiday, two Australian states,  an award marking acts of valor, and now, a lace crown!

This addition to the crown collection is truly a "statement" crown.  Measuring over 4 inches in height and 6 3/4 inch diameter, it is best suited for wear by girls age 4 through 10 years of age.  It is also an amazing decor crown with its intricately patterned lace.  

The crown pictured is representative of the one you will receive.  Each crown is individually handcrafted and as such, slight variations will occur.    

Crowns are not designed as toys for children.  Children should be supervised by an adult at all times when wearing them.

name: Lotus - Limited Edition
description:
The lotus flower grows in muddy water and rises above the surface to bloom with remarkable beauty. At night the flower closes and sinks underwater, at dawn it rises and opens again. Untouched by the impurity, lotus symbolizes the purity of heart and mind. 

Available in both soft and vibrant colors, this delicate crown is perfect for newborn photography.  
 
Lotus measures 1 inch at the tallest point.  

The crown pictured is representative of the one you will receive.  Each crown is individually handcrafted and as such, slight variations will occur.    

Crowns are not designed as toys for children.  Children should be supervised by an adult at all times when wearing them.

name: Arden
description:
The Arden crown is delicate yet strong, just like a little girl I know.  

This gorgeous crown is very light and flexible.  So versatile -- use as a newborn crown or for little girls as shown in the snow princess image taken by Munchkins and Mohawks photography.  www.munchkinsandmohawksphotography.com

The crown pictured is representative of the one you will receive.  Each crown is individually handcrafted and as such, slight variations will occur.    

Crowns are not designed as toys for children.  Children should be supervised by an adult at all times when wearing them.
